org.cantaloupe.database.mongodb

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cantaloupe.database.mongodb.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to manage a database for a MongoDB server.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getCollection

        public java.util.Optional<Collection> getCollection(java.lang.String collectionName)
        Gets a collection from the database.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - The name of a collection
        Returns:
